divs: Sighting Details i was lying i bed looking out window.2 in thenight,just turned off t.v.then a light blinking on one sec then off for two secstarts across my view from right side of window.at first i thougt copter, then ithought car on mountain road when there was no sound.bedroom window wide open.itwas hot that night.it was too big to be airplane light.i thought it washighbeams.in morning i realized that the mountain was way below myline of sight.the thing was almost a mile in sky,but it looked like highbeams of car about 75yards away.i could tell the object was about 3 blocks away in distance.straightline and abouthalf mile up. i heard no sound, no dogs, nothing.it caught me offguard.i should have gone to window to see how and where it went.at the time iwas sure it was car, but the mountains are so far that the light would be afaint dot.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Lake Elsinore
There were no other sightings in Lake Elsinore on or around August 1st 2001
